options.content:
The panels below are grouped by Gateways and APIs.

A Gateway is a [Gateway API defined gateway](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/concepts/api-overview/#gateway) resource. An API is realised by a [Gateway API HTTPRoute](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/concepts/api-overview/#httproute).
Any policies [attached to the Gateways and APIs](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/geps/gep-713/) will be shown, as well as summary request and error metrics for APIs.

*Important: HTTPRoutes must include a "service" and "deployment" label with a value that matches the name of the service & deployment being routed to. eg. "service=myapp, deployment=myapp"*

panels.title: Overview of Gateways, Policies and APIs

panels.description: List of all Gateways, their class and status.
panels.title: Gateways

panels.description: Total number of Gateway API gateways
panels.title: Total

panels.description: List of all Policies targeting a Gateway
panels.title: Gateway Policies

panels.description: Total Gateways with an [Accepted and Programmed](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/reference/spec/#gateway.networking.k8s.io%2fv1.GatewayConditionType) state of True
panels.title: Healthy

panels.description: Total Gateways with a False or missing [Accepted or Programmed](https://gateway-api.sigs.k8s.io/reference/spec/#gateway.networking.k8s.io%2fv1.GatewayConditionType) state.

targets.expr:
count(gatewayapi_gateway_info unless (gatewayapi_gateway_info{namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}"} * on(name, namespace) group_left gatewayapi_gateway_status{namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}",type="Programmed"})
or ignoring(type)
gatewayapi_gateway_info unless (gatewayapi_gateway_info{namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}"} * on(name, namespace) group_left gatewayapi_gateway_status{namespace=~"${gateway_namespace}",type="Accepted"}))

panels.title: Unhealthy

panels.description: List of all APIs (HTTPRoutes) and their hostnames & corresponding Deployment names.
panels.title: APIs/HTTPRoutes

panels.description: List of all Policies targeting HTTPRoutes
panels.title: HTTPRoute Policies

panels.description:
Aggregated rate of requests per API (HTTPRoute). The API name can be cross referenced with the API list to see additional details.

Note: HTTPRoutes require a label `deployment` with the name of the corresponding Deployment so that istio request metrics can be paired with HTTPRoute metrics.
panels.title: Total requests (req/sec)

panels.description:
Aggregated rate of bytes per API (HTTPRoute). The API name can be cross referenced with the API list to see additional details.

Note: HTTPRoutes require a label `deployment` with the name of the corresponding Deployment so that istio request metrics can be paired with HTTPRoute metrics.
panels.title: Total requests (bytes/sec)

panels.description: Rate of 4xx, 5xx and total HTTP response code errors by API/HTTPRoute
panels.title: Errors (req/s)

panels.description: CPU Usage of all workloads (Deployments) linked to a HTTPRoute. That is, they have a corresponding HTTPRoute with a deployment label.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory Usage of all workloads (Deployments) linked to a HTTPRoute. That is, they have a corresponding HTTPRoute with a deployment label.
panels.title: Memory Usage
